title: Silicon Nanowires @ Void @ Carbon on Conductive Substrate, as a Scalable Binder free Anode Electrode for Lithium Ion Battery, with Superior Performance
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00314D, Paper
Mohammadreza Yasoubi, Alireza Habibi, Soraya Hoornam, Zeinab Sanaee, Shams Mohajerzadeh
Silicon based anode materials have gained great deal of attention in Lithium-ion batteries (LIBs) and have been implemented in multiple commercialized batteries in recent years. This paper presents synthesis of...
